leads.name: SPEAKER_01
leads.opportunity: Research collaboration on new machine learning topics and software development

leads.name: SPEAKER_00
leads.opportunity: Partnership for deep learning framework development and academic research

opportunities.description: Invest in effective deep learning software frameworks proven to be successful in early research phases
Collaborate with University of Toronto, NYU, Stanford for cutting-edge research and software development

action_items: Reach out to SPEAKER_01 at University of Toronto for research topic exploration and collaboration
Initiate contact with SPEAKER_00 representing NYU and Stanford to discuss partnership opportunities
Evaluate current software frameworks for possible investment and scaling
Identify funding and resource support for deep learning software projects
